Comment: 3..Nd4!?. The start of Blackburne's Schilling Gambit. Apparently so called as the 19th Centuy English master Blackburn used it to win shilling bets against amateur players. Wikipedia states he drank whisky during exhibition games and frequently became drunk and even violent during games!
